headline: Assessing Exxon’s Value After Secret Talks With Rosneft Spark New Growth Hopes
summary: If you are eyeing Exxon Mobil and wondering whether now is the moment to buy, sell, or simply watch from the sidelines, you are not alone. It seems like everyone has an opinion. To cut through the noise, it helps to focus on what really matters: value and potential. Recently, Exxon Mobil has seen its share price move up 3.9% over the last week and 1.2% in the past month. Looking at a broader timeframe, the stock’s year-to-date gain sits at 5.1%, and the past three years have brought a 30.7%...
